oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Metri 2 - Marine Environments Tests and Research Infrastructure - Final Report
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pichon, Jack
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The project started the 1st of March 2006 as soon as the contract was signed. This Final and covers the period from the 1st of March 2006 up to the 31st of August 2010 which is the date of the completion of the contract. Globally twenty-nine projects was selected and finally twenty four were actually performed at the end of the contract. They are involving the wave basin of Brest (9 projects), the water circulation of Boulogne/mer (7 projects), the material laboratory of Brest (5 projects) and the hyberbaric testing tanks of Brest (3 projects).

Le rapport reprends les 4 rapports annuels d'activité et présente une synthèse de l'ensemble. Il a été rédigé en Septembre 2010 à la fin du projet. Le rapport décrit les 24 activités de transnational access (TA) opérées au cours des quatre années du projet.
